body: that art is extremely impressive tho

This is a nice, realistic and refreshing perspective on prostitution ever portrait in a ero manga, without any inclusion of the usual stereotypes or cliches, I didn't even faped to this, jist read it for the feeling, like reading a one shot manga.

This author makes some hearth wretching mangas.
This doujin is such a mood.
god this guys art is so good

I loved those moments where it just seemed like the world stood still, and everything went silent. Also I really recommend the comic The World Where I Belong, on webtoon. It's SFW (no sex, but definitely more mature themes), but has the same visual, and tonal style.

I like it in a sense of how realistic and believable it is... like I can see this happening in real life. The usual stereotype of prostitution is that mind break, full of disrespect and shit, and sadly yeah that actually happens.

But this awkward platonic professional shit seems fresh. How awkward it is in a way and how tense the client was. Good read, very interesting
That girl reminds me of lofi hip hop to study
holy fuck the art style is so good
this is some pretentious shit
same @Nathan.666
"the string in the shadows"? I prefer "no string attached" xD.
I love this. The realistic vibe, the awkwardness, shy coz quick shooter and half nude scene.
We need this dude writing real manga.
This remember me to "A Girl By The Sea"
Why i feel this emptiness? The story about a boy have a call girl taking his v- card
Would be better as vanilla.
I was so ready for someone to get murdered....
why does this feels gay
Country roaad take me home 🎶
Holy shit that art tho
Them art tho.  Good shit good shit

The attention to detail... ufff, so great. Some awkward moments too that make it hard to understand exactly what he or she is thinking, but that makes it seem more real. Things just sort of happen, not really in a pretty or controlled way. In the end, maybe he regrets spending the money because he came and that was it, but then again, she didn't have to do all of that. I don't think it was all just business, more like that's how she keeps the boundary between love and sex, so he can still hold onto that feeling of being desired by someone else, of being OK in their eyes, even in his weakest, most pathetic state. I want this in hardcover with big glossy pages <3

dang! 
this is some art tight here.
Its pretty dark and realistic but i dont mind
waited for this translation for a while, it's fucking dark but adorable
